titleStmt.title: Pyrgomachia; vel potius, Pygomachia Or, in cleane English, The castle-combat. Performed; by Iames Fencer, and William Wrastler. At nine of the clock of the night of the ninth day of the ninth moneth of the ninth yeare of the reigne of our Soveraigne Lord King Charles. Recorded by the ninth of the nine Muses, in the ninth part of nine weekes: and devided into nine files.
titleStmt.author: Gower, John, Master of Arts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for Robert Milbourne,

notesStmt.note: The words "Iames .. Wrastler" are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
